Description: Now totally reimagined with all-new music, costumes and choreography, Le R_ve _ The Dream welcomes you into a thrilling acrobatic fantasy world, set inside an aqua theater-in-the-round. Follow the show_s heroine, The Dreamer, through a suspenseful dream sequence on her journey to choose between the dueling desires of true love and dark passion. From a dramatic high dive to an alluring underwater tango, the powerful new soundtrack, lighting and effects will captivate you in every moment. Voted "Best Production Show" in Las Vegas for an unprecedented eight consecutive years, the gripping narrative and breathtaking feats of strength and agility experienced throughout The Dreamer_s story bring this ever-evolving masterpiece to new heights.Buy tickets online or call show reservations at (702) 770-9966.
Location: 3145 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Diana Ross returns to the Encore Theater once again for a series of dynamic new performances in February 2019. These performances will kick off a very special year of celebrating her 75th Birthday DiaMon Jubilee with an all new show. Ms. Ross is a national treasure and known as one of the world_s greatest entertainers of all time. She has been inducted into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame and is the recipient of a GRAMMY Lifetime Achievement Award. She has selected songs from her rich and historic music catalogue specifically for this exclusive engagement at Wynn. Each evening will celebrate her enduring collection of award-winning songs, brilliant new costumes and timeless memories to millions of fans across the world, and promises to be an experience fans will never forget.Buy tickets online or call show reservations at (702) 770-9966.
Location: 3145 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Event Name: Chris Tucker: One Night At Wynn
Description: Laughter is guaranteed when Chris Tucker performs for two shows on Satrday, January 19, in the Encore Theater. The acclaimed comedian and actor is known for the phenomenally successful Rush Hour series, as well as the Oscar-nominated Silver Linings Playbook. Whether you_re familiar with Tucker_s comedy from his breakout success on HBO_s Def Comedy Jam or his starring role in the cult classic Friay, you_ll love his current return to stand-up_which kicked off with the Netflix original special, Chris Tucker: Live. Chris Tucker_s global tour reaches from the United Kingdom, to South Africa and points beyond, but this is his only scheduled Las Vegas appearance. Buy tickets now to ensure you won_t miss this exclusive evening.Buy tickets online or call show reservations at (702) 770-9966.
Location: 3145 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: The true spirit of Motown comes to Wynn this spring when the legendary Smokey Robinson arrives for three exclusive performances at the intimate Encore Theater. As a member of The Miracles, Robinson co-founded the iconic music label with Berry Gordy Jr. and went on to produce 26 top-40 hits, including _You_ve Really Got a Hold On Me,_ _I Second That Emotion_ and _The Tears of a Clown._ As one of Motown_s most prolific songwriters and producers, Robinson is also responsible for _My Guy,_ _The Way You Do the Things You Do,_ and _Get Ready._ Among the earliest inductees of the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame, Robinson also has enjoyed a stellar solo career with hits like _Cruisin__ and _Being With You._ Book your tickets now to experience the man Bob Dylan has called _America_s Greatest Poet._ Buy tickets online or call show reservations at (702) 770-9966.
Location: 3145 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: He_s the U.K._s number-one British solo artist and, with more than 75 million records sold worldwide, one of the best-selling music artists of all time: Now Robbie Williams is bringing his unforgettable concert experience to Wynn Las Vegas for his first-ever U.S. residency. The global pop phenomenon kicks off his exclusive performances in March at the Encore Theater, where he_ll perform his biggest hits and a few special surprises. Whether you know Williams_ work from such hugely popular songs as _Millennium,_ _Rock DJ_ and _Angels,_ or his contributions to the soundtracks for hit films like X Men: First Class and Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason, Robbie Williams will thrill you with a night of sensational music. Fresh from his 2017-18 world tour of sold-out stadiums, Williams and his incredible voice also are sure to shine amid the exceptional acoustics of the state-of-the-art Encore Theater. Buy tickets online or call show reservations at (702) 770-9966.
Location: 3146 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Grammy Award-winning artist Kenny Loggins brings his greatest hits to Encore Theater for a trio of exclusive performances March 27, 29 and 30. From his time as one-half of the duo known as Loggins & Messina, with hits like _Danny_s Song,_ to his phenomenally successful solo career, the legendary singer and songwriter has been producing iconic music celebrated by every generation. You_ll also thrill to live renditions of songs you know from some of the world_s most popular films, as the unofficial _King of the Soundtrack_ performs _I_m Alright_ from Caddyshack, _Danger Zone_ from Top Gun, and, of course, the Oscar-nominated _Footloose._ Loggins loves connecting with fans at each of his concerts, ensuring this appearance at the intimate Encore Theater will be truly memorable. With just 1,600 seats and exceptional acoustics, this state-of-the-art venue transforms every musical event into a personal experience, making this a night not to be missed. Buy tickets online or call show reservations at (702) 770-9966.
Location: 3160 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Rock & Roll Hall of Famer John Fogerty is returning to Wynn in April to debut _My 50-Year Trip,_ a new concert celebrating both the iconic musician_s half-century onstage and perhaps his best-known performance: the legendary New York music festival, Woodstock. With the festival_s 50th anniversary approaching in August 2019, Fogerty has put together an evening that highlights songs that were created at that time like _Born On The Bayou,_ _Proud Mary,_ and all the fan favorites from Creedence Clearwater Revival, including John_s original Woodstock set list. The Encore Theater is the perfect venue for this special evening, combining outstanding acoustics with an intimate vibe to showcase a montage of vintage photography and Fogerty_s own stories about one of the greatest musical gatherings of all time. Buy tickets online or call show reservations at (702) 770-9966.
Location: 3160 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

With the festival_s 50th anniversary approaching in August 2019, Fogerty has put together an evening that highlights songs that were created at that time like _Born On The Bayou,_ _Proud Mary,_ and all the fan favorites from Creedence Clearwater Revival, including John_s original Woodstock set list. The Encore Theater is the perfect venue for this special evening, combining outstanding acoustics with an intimate vibe to showcase a montage of vintage photography and Fogerty_s own stories about one of the greatest musical gatherings of all time. Buy tickets online or call show reservations at (702) 770-9966.
Location: 3160 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Sarah McLachlan has sold more than 40 million albums worldwide and produced a multitude of chart-topping hits and now the multi-platinum singer and songwriter is bringing her sensational voice and all the songs you love to Wynn on April 24, 26 and 27.From _I Will Remember You_ to _Sweet Surrender_ and her iconic ballad _Angel,_ McLachlan_s music speaks to every heart through engaging lyrics, gorgeous melodies and her signature mezzo-soprano vocal range. McLachlan_s exceptional talents have led to numerous awards, including three GRAMMYs, a Billboard Music Award and 12 Juno Awards in her native Canada. An avid supporter of promoting female singers and songwriters, McLachlan was also the founder of Lilith Fair, which raised more than $10 million for women_s local and national charities during its initial three-year run. Following the success of Lilith Fair, McLachlan founded her non-profit Sarah McLachlan School of Music, which provides high quality music education and mentorship, at no-cost, to over 1,000 at-risk and underserved children and youth in Vancouver, Surrey and Edmonton. With its state-of-the-art acoustics, the intimate Encore Theater is a perfect venue for McLachlan_s stunning vocals. Buy tickets online or call show reservations at (702) 770-9966.
Location: 3160 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Shows run nightly, every half hour beginning at 8 p.m. until 12:30 a.m. The Lake of Dreams, with its 40-foot waterfall, pine-topped mountain and nightly shows is a sight to behold. Take the circular escalator from Parasol Up at Wynn and experience the dazzling shows while enjoying a cocktail at Parasol Down, out on the show terrace for a water's edge view or while dining at our two open-front restaurants, Lakeside or SW Steakhouse. When the sun sets, the Lake of Dreams comes alive in a spectacle of music and imagery created by over four thousand lights, stunning holographics and puppetry.
Location: 3160 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
